pullRequest.title: System Table for Optimizer Rule Stats
pullRequest.bodyText:
#4504
I think a single-page pagesource would be okay, since the total size (from page.getSizeInBytes()) comes out to be ~389K. (mainly from the map block for percentiles)

nodes.bodyText:
Don't use InternalTypeManager. That's an implementation detail of the metadata system:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            .column("time_distribution_percentiles", new InternalTypeManager(metadata).getType(mapType(DOUBLE.getTypeSignature(), DOUBLE.getTypeSignature())))
          
          
            
                           .column("time_distribution_percentiles", metadata.getType(mapType(DOUBLE.getTypeSignature(), DOUBLE.getTypeSignature())))
Let's remove this column. All measurements are in the same unit, so we don't need to clarify what the unit is per row.

commit.message: Add invocation count to optimizer rule stats
Add system table to expose optimizer rule stats

afterCommit.message: Add system table to expose optimizer rule stats
